channel.title: Upcoming shows on Income Tax Refund
channel.description: Recent content in Upcoming shows on Income Tax Refund

item.title: CIA Débutante + Kevin Diesel + Little Gem Band
item.description: income tax refund presents Thursday, 27 July Where: ???? Doors: ???? Start: ???? CIA Débutante (france) sluggish pools of greyscale electronics and viscous synth blubber, prodded by corroded beats and warped dictaphone gargle Down, Willow (Siltbreeze, 2023) Dust (Siltbreeze, 2021) Slow Cancellation (Premier Sang, 2019) https://youtu.be/G5Q8qCfuvj0 \ Kevin Diesel (france) aka. Flo of PartoutPartout/100%chevalier - will likely lauch some banging musical rockets to the rhythm of the machines. this’s gonna go so hard!

item.title: Juicebumps + Skeleton Glove + Heavy Petting + Teddies Kneipe + Snitsh Pitsh
item.description: income tax refund presents Sunday, 23 July Where: 술집 Doors: 16:00 Start: 17:00 Finito: 22:00 JUICEBUMPS (oakland // spank-rock? spookwave?) https://youtu.be/UyIuX5M5YAU https://youtu.be/QB64XbmEbpg https://juicebumps.bandcamp.com/ ++++ tape out soon via U-Bac & OfBits&Pieces \ SKELETON GLOVE (bln // high speed spook punk) https://skeletonglove.bandcamp.com/album/skeleton-glove \ HEAVY PETTING (lpz / wmr // krauty new wave hits hits hits) https://heavypetting.bandcamp.com \ Teddies Kneipe (brm // deutschpunk-wingding) https://teddieskneipe.bandcamp.com/album/live072022 \ Snitsh Pitsh (lpz // clout-punk) https://ofbitsandpieces.bandcamp.com/album/snitsh-pitsh-2

item.title: Alpha Strategy + HUGAYZ + Bentley Anderson
item.description: income tax refund presents a musical transmission at the TV Studio East on Wednesday, 5 July with the artists: Alpha Strategy (noisy noise rock from Czechia) HUGAYZ (eggy punk from Poland // plusz tapes) Bentley Anderson (guitar manglings from NYC // Trouble In Mind Records) GMO-flavoured daisy by Aranzazu Morena Doors: 19h00 Start: 20h00 End: 22h30 Alpha Strategy The Caressing Cloth (single, 2022) \ HUGAYZ Hugz and Kissez (album, 2021)

item.title: Bâton XXL + Giulio Erasmus + Hell.no
item.description: income tax refund presents the night of the solos at T|FF! with Bâton XXL [amièns, france] amplified percussions, improved performance, retroaction, trance, voice = Romain Simon of formerly Headwar, Me Donner etc etc https://baton.hotglue.me/?baton https://batonxxl.bandcamp.com/ \ Giulio Erasmus [brussels, manchester] Lo-fi dub waves by the DUDS and HANDLE funkstar https://absolutefiction.bandcamp.com/album/giulio-erasmus-re-adjustment \ Hell.no [leepzzg] …of Heike Bartsch fame. Surprise! leftfield sample demolition ambient \ Doors: 19h30 Start: 20h00 End: 23h00
